sentences: Suzanne Aspden is professor of music at Jesus College, University of Oxford.
She was formerly a research fellow at Robinson College, University of Cambridge from 1999 to 2002 and a lecturer in music at the University of Southampton from 2002 to 2005.
In 2002-3 she was the first John Marshall and Marie Louise Osborn Fellow at the Beinecke Library, Yale University.
